column4: Hi, gius! NEED HELP! I was setting a disklabel (why in a world I would do that...) and it deleted ALL paritions on my HDD !!! IS THERE A WAY TO RECOVER MY DATA!?? PLS HELP
you could try this http://www.linux.com/base/ldp/howto/Partition/recovering.html. I did not test it though, so no idea if it works.
